conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I want to watch a sci-fi movie.

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
Sure, here are some sci-fi movies you might enjoy:

* Blade Runner (1982)
* The Terminator (1984)
* Aliens (1986)
* Interstellar (2014)
* Star Trek (franchise)
* Blade Runner 2049 (2017)

constraints.genre:
the genre of the movie is sci-fi.

sci-fi is a genre of fiction that deals with imagined future scientific and technological advances, as well as their potential consequences.
